levels.description: Immediately heals all friendly units within range and creates a<$ba.epbarrier> Protective Barrier</> for them that lasts <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds; Protective Barrier absorbs <$ba.dt.element>Elemental Injury</> for all friendly units equal to <@ba.vup>{agoat2_s_2[shield].atk_scale:0%}</> of ATK
